oai:envidat.ch:7c8c6c9c-729b-40b6-847c-80b77f4539e6;2018-12-09T00:33:37Z;10.21258/1057112;Abegg, M.;WSL;Brändli, U.-B.;WSL;Cioldi, F.;WSL;Fischer, C.;WSL;Herold-Bonardi, A.;WSL;Huber M.;WSL;Keller, M.;WSL;Meile, R.;WSL;Rösler, E.;WSL;Speich, S.;WSL;Traub, B.;WSL;Vidondo, B.;WSL;Volume of dead wood NFI1;2014;Swiss Federal Research Institute WSL;ACCESSIBLE FOREST WITHOUT SHRUB FOREST;ACCESSIBLE FOREST WITHOUT SHRUB FOREST NFI1-NFI2-NFI3-NFI4;ALTITUDINAL VEGETATION ZONE;ALTITUDINAL VEGETATION ZONE 3 CLASSES;BIOGEOGRAPHICAL REGION;CANTON;CONIFERS-BROADLEAVES;ECONOMIC REGION;FOREST DISTRICT AS OF 2013;GRID NFI4 2009-2013;LOWER-HIGHER ALTITUDINAL ZONES;MAIN TREE SPECIES;NFI1;OWNERSHIP;PRIMARY FOREST FUNCTION NFI4 NATURE PROTECTION;PRODUCTION REGION;PROTECTION FOREST REGION;TERRESTRIAL GRID NFI1;TREE STATE STANDING-LYING;VOLUME OF DEAD WOOD NFI1;Urs-Beat Brändli;WSL;2018-12-06;en;Dataset;https://www.envidat.ch/dataset/volume_of_dead_wood_nfi1-249;URL;1.0;Other (Open);Volume of stemwood with bark of all dead trees and shrubs (standing and lying)  starting at 12 cm dbh  recorded according to the NFI1 method. In NFI1 only those dead trees were recorded whose wood could still be exploited. In addition, lying green trees were classified in NFI1 as deadwood.

name: 580588e6-9e6c-5029-a68a-dde775838553
notes:
Volume of stemwood with bark of all dead trees and shrubs (standing and lying)  starting at 12 cm dbh  recorded according to the NFI1 method. In NFI1 only those dead trees were recorded whose wood could still be exploited. In addition, lying green trees were classified in NFI1 as deadwood.

__Citation:__
